# 2D volcano plots
```{r}
#| include: False
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = FALSE)
```

```{r}
#| include: False
here::i_am("quarto/02-volcano2D.qmd")

# Import packages
library(EnhancedVolcano)
library(patchwork)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)

# Load data for plotting
plots_volcano_ma <- readRDS(
  file = here::here(
    "output",
    "plots_volcano_ma",
    "plots_volcano_ma.RDS"
  )
)

list_trio <- list(
  treat_day3 = c(1, 3, 5),
  treat_day5 = c(2, 4, 6),
  days_untreat = c(7, 8, 9),
  days_treat = c(10, 11, 12),
  passage_day3 = c(13, 14, 15),
  passage_day5 = c(19, 20, 21)
)
```

## All volcano + MA plots

```{r}
walk(plots_volcano_ma, plot)
```

## Grouped plots for thesis

```{r}
#| fig.width: 8
#| fig.height: 8
plots_trio <- list_trio %>%
  map(\(x) plots_volcano_ma[x]) %>%
  map(\(x) {
    plot_grid(
      plotlist = x,
      ncol = 1,
      labels = "AUTO"
    )
  })

walk(plots_trio, plot)
```
